name: DiceWalker
description:
How to play

It is like a lot of games where you move according to a dice roll. However, after every roll, you can choose to change one of the dice using either number keys 1 through 6 or a direction key. However, the edges of the board and single-direction tiles can block you. To win, you must land on the star, after which a new star and a new single-direction tile, which only allows movement in one direction, appear. 

Controls

1 through 6 - Change the numerical die

Arrow keys - Change the direction

R - Reset
